article:
My family suffered some economic problems last year. I didn't know how I was going to buy Christmas gifts for my children   _  my own Santa
turned up.
One day while window shopping with my one-year-old son, a   _  walked to me and began a
conversation asking some usual baby questions. He  _  himself
as John, and asked for help with  _  for his
grandkids for not knowing what to buy. I agreed since I was  _  .
We went through the store   _  out this and that. The whole time he kept  _  for
taking up my time and was saying how hard it was to  _  nice
people. When the shopping cart was full of clothes and toys, John  _  for all my help. We parted soon.
 I was about to leave the store   _  I heard a woman calling out "Hey, you  _  something.
" When she came up to me, she said she had something for me at customer
service. She  _  a cart full of bags towards me.
I was confused, so I told her she must have the  _  person.
She then handed me an envelope with a card which  _    :
 "Thank you for helping an old man find joy again. You made me   _  that Mary, my
beloved, was looking at me from above to send one of her angels when I needed
one most. The gifts you  _  me pick out are
for you and your children. You are a kind person and this is my  _  to
you. Never change.------John"
I looked around to see if I could find John but he was   _    .I stood there for a few minutes as the  _  rolled down my cheeks, speechless and
thankful. On Christmas day my ten-year-old son asked where the gifts came from
and I told him  _  ...
